thread.title: John Stamos is facing as much as 6 months in jail in DUI case - Showbiz
thread.title_full: John Stamos is facing as much as 6 months in jail in DUI case - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: John Stamos is facing as much as 6 months in jail in DUI case - Showbiz
text: John Stamos could face six months behind bars if convicted of a DUI.The Los Angeles County Attorney's office formally filed a criminal charge against the actor today for driving "while under the influence of a drug". Â© Getty Images / Jason Merritt Court documents also revealed that Stamos will be arraigned in an LA Superior Court on Friday (October 16).Stamos was stopped by the authorities in June and was subsequently hospitalised for medical treatment.Almost immediately following his arrest, Stamos entered a residential rehab programme for 30 days of treatment.Since being released from treatment, Stamos has continued work on both Fox's freshman comedy Grandfathered and the Netflix revival of Full House.It is not clear yet how either series would cope with Stamos serving jail time.
